title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Time synchronization
description: The uCIFI time synchronization object enables a device to sync-up its internal clock with a remote NTP server.. objectID:'3415'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3415:2.0'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'2.0'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Time synchronization`.

NTP server address.description: Property. Hostname or IP address of the Network Time Protocol server.. resourceID:'1'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Backup NTP server address.description: Property. Hostname or IP address of a backup NTP server to be used in case the main NTP server does not respond.. resourceID:'2'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

NTP period.description: Property. Number of hours before which the device tries to reach the NTP server for time synchronization.. resourceID:'3'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'h'.

Last time sync.description: Property. Last time at which a successful time synchronization occurred.. resourceID:'4'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'h'.

Time sync error.description: Property. Set to True in case the latest time synchronization operation failed. Set to False in case the last operation succeeded.. resourceID:'5'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.
